column3: ej,stott001,P,darlg901,Fighting with Charlie Hayes ej,hayec001,P,darlg901,Fighting with Todd Stottlemyre $Charlie Hayes was upset after hitting into a force play and was talking to himself; Todd Stottlemyre thought Hayes was talking to him; after Hayes moved to 2B on the single, Stottlemyre telled at Hayes, who charged the mound; D-Backs 3B Matt Williams grabbed Hayes and Giants 3B coach Sonny Jackson tackled Stottlemyre; both players were ejected by HP umpire Gary Darling

ej,kim-b001,P,wintm901,Foreign object in glove $Pitcher Kim ejected by HP umpire Winters for having a foreign object in his uniform; it was a bandage containing heat balm which flew out of his shirt sleeve and was discovered as the Cubs took the field for bottom of 8th

ej,corrp102,C,kellj901,Balls and strikes ej,cox-b103,M,kellj901,Balls and strikes $Braves manager Cox and coach Corrales ejected by HP umpire Kellogg for arguing balls and strikes after Williams walked
ej,sprae001,P,willc901,Call at 3B Pirates Ed Sprague ejected by 3B umpire Charlie Williams
